title: AppleSoft Basic Fractal Tree
description: Take a trip back in time and watch me attempt to build a 3D graphics engine in AppleSoft BASIC on a restored Apple II+ computer! Can I render a spinning cube?

timestamps.title: Initialize high resolution graphics for 2 pages
Add a subroutine that draws a line between two points
Subroutine to add the points of a cube
Edit code to add more points
Connect the points to draw a cube
See you next time on Coding Together!
